description:
Use the connected Belfius card reader to exchange files and manage your directories.

Belfius Connector allows you to use the Belfius card reader connected to your computer via a USB cable to:
- start BelfiusWeb and automatically read your BelfiusWeb card
- sign your transactions using a simplified procedure
- read an electronic identity card (eID)
With this software, you can optionally in BelfiusWeb:
- manage preferred directories for receiving and sending files*
- upload several files at once to the reporting functionalities (CODA, PaPyRuS)*
(*) These actions are also possible if you start BelfiusWeb without connecting the USB cable to the computer:
- provided the software has been installed and you have given your consent for its use when starting it up.
